titleStmt.title: GOOD READER BEARE with these small faultes, or other, which in this difficulty of prin∣ting, there where oure ton∣ge is not vnderstāded, must needes be committed.

monogr.title: A defense and declaration of the Catholike Churchies [sic] doctrine, touching purgatory, and prayers for the soules departed. by William Allen Master of Arte and student in diuinitye
monogr.author: Allen, William
